game.title: Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the Lost City of Eldarath and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.description: The city has been hidden for centuries, and its location is rumored to be hidden within a series of ancient ruins.
game.reward: 100 gold pieces and a magical amulet

tasks.description: Seek out the ancient ruin of Zorvath in the nearby mountains.
Acquire an ancient scroll from the ruin and decipher its cryptic clues to find the city's location.
Use the decoded information to locate the Lost City of Eldarath and retrieve an ancient artifact.
